name: Hell Oh Hell
description:
In some computers incial video didn`t run properly, if its your case just press "space" an it will show you the main menu.

Hell Oh Hell is an endless plataformer where you put yourself in the shoes of Lucifer, an angel who has provoked the wrath of God and you´ll have to escape from heaven to avoid being sent to hell for eternity.

Controls:

Space - Jump / Doble Jump (Keep pressing for slow fall)

Shift - Dash ( You can hit enemies with it to destroy them)

E - Shield (To cross and avoid lasers and thunders)

Developers:

This game was developed in 4 days for a Game Jam done in "EVAD" a Spanish Game design School

Game design By "Los unicornios Psicodélicos del Espacio" composed by:

- Daniel Gutierrez & Gonzalo Blanch as mains programmers

- Álvaro Segorbe as artist

- Daniel Aguilar as designer
